entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 12:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: 3.7°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain changing to freezing rain with rain in the morning then to ice pellets in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
